testCases.explanation: Level 0: see 1; Level 1: rightmost is 3; Level 2: rightmost is 4
Level 0: see 1; Level 1: only right child 3 visible
Empty tree has no right side view
Single node is visible from the right
Level 0: 1; Level 1: rightmost is 3; Level 2: rightmost is 4 (only child of 2)

description: Given the root of a binary tree, imagine yourself standing on the right side of it. Return the values of the nodes you can see ordered from top to bottom.

examples.explanation: Viewing from the right: at each level, the rightmost node is visible.
The right child 3 is visible at level 1.
Empty tree has no visible nodes.

constraints: The number of nodes in the tree is in the range [0, 100]
